concept.title: Data Preview Availability
concept.shortdesc: You can access data preview for complete and incomplete pipelines. The Data Preview icon becomes active when data preview is available.

conbody.p:
You can view preview data under the following conditions:
All stages in the pipeline are connected
All required properties are defined

p.note: Stage configuration does not have to be accurate or complete to preview data. After you connect all stages, enter any valid value for required properties to enable data preview.
